Steps To Earn Offers

1ST Step: Order

Enjoy your favorite meal by ordering any type of our food online or eat at our restaurant by spending a minimum of £15 a visit. There is no limit to the amount of visit or order you can make.

2ND Step: Points

A minimum visit of £15 earns you a point which gives you 10% off your next visit or order. There is no limit to the amount of points you can earn. Your points cannot be used for drinks or tax.

3RD Step: Redeem

Redeem points online or at restaurant in the next 60 days period or within 2 months of earning. Points have to be used within a year of redeeming or they will be void. They cannot be used by a different person.
